The [93mNSM[0m'[93ms[0m [93mmaximum[0m [93madsorption[0m [93mcapacity[0m ([93mQ[0m [93mm[0m ) was [93m30[0m.[93m30[0m [93mmg[0m [93mg[0m -[93m1[0m . [93mExperimental[0m [93mdata[0m were [93mdiscussed[0m [93musing[0m the [93mLangmuir[0m ([93mLIM[0m), [93mFreundlich[0m ([93mFIM[0m), and [93mTempkin[0m ([93mTIM[0m) [93misotherm[0m [92mmodels[0m. The [93mexperimental[0m [93mdata[0m from [93mNSM[0m [93maligns[0m [93meffectively[0m with the [93mLIM[0m [92mmodel[0m. [93mSeveral[0m [93merror[0m [93mfunctions[0m, [93msuch[0m as [93mChi[0m-[93mSquared[0m [93mError[0m ([93mX[0m [93m2[0m ), [93mAverage[0m [93mPercent[0m [93mError[0m ([93mAPE[0m), [93mRoot[0m [93mMean[0m [93mSquare[0m ([93mRMS[0m), [93mSum[0m of [93mAbsolute[0m [93mErrors[0m ([93mEABS[0m), [95mHybrid[0m [93mError[0m [93mFunction[0m ([95mHYBRID[0m), and [93mMarquardt[0m'[93ms[0m [93mPercent[0m [93mStandard[0m [93mDeviation[0m ([93mMPSD[0m), were [93mapplied[0m to [95mvalidate[0m the [93misotherm[0m [92mmodel[0m [93mdata[0m. [93mCalculations[0m of the [93merror[0m [93mfunction[0m [93msuggest[0m that the [93mLIM[0m is the [93mmost[0m [93mappropriate[0m for [93mcharacterizing[0m the [93madsorption[0m [93mprocess[0m. [93mKinetic[0m [93mdata[0m were [93manalyzed[0m by [93mfitting[0m [93mpseudo[0m-[93mfirst[0m-[93morder[0m ([93mPFOM[0m), [93mpseudo[0m-[93msecond[0m-[93morder[0m ([93mPSOM[0m), [93mintraparticle[0m [93mdiffusion[0m ([93mIPDM[0m) and [93mfilm[0m [93mdiffusion[0m ([93mFDM[0m) [92mmodels[0m. - A [93msteel[0m [93mslag[0m-[93mactivated[0m [93mcolumn[0m for [93mco[0m-[93mremoval[0m of [93msulfate[0m and [93mmetals[0m from [93macid[0m [93mmine[0m [93mdrainage[0m.: [93mAcid[0m [93mmine[0m [93mdrainage[0m ([93mAMD[0m), [93mcontaining[0m [93mexcessive[0m [93msulfates[0m and [93mheavy[0m [93mmetals[0m, [93mposes[0m a [93msevere[0m [93mthreat[0m to the [93menvironment[0m and [93mhuman[0m [93mhealth[0m. In this [93mstudy[0m, a [93mlaboratory[0m-[93mscale[0m [93mcolumn[0m [93mdevice[0m [93musing[0m [93mvarying[0m [93mratios[0m of [93mcoarse[0m [93msand[0m to [93mcarbon[0m [93msteel[0m [93mslag[0m ([93mCS[0m/[93mCSS[0m) as the [93mfilled[0m [93mmaterial[0m was [93mdesigned[0m to [93mefficiently[0m [93mremove[0m [93mtypical[0m [93mpollutants[0m in [93mAMD[0m. [93mResults[0m [93mrevealed[0m that the [93mremoval[0m [93mrates[0m of SO [93m4[0m [93m2[0m- , [93mFe[0m, [93mMn[0m, and [93mZn[0m, as [93mwell[0m as the [93mpH[0m [93mvalue[0m of the [93msolution[0m were [93minfluenced[0m by the [93mratio[0m of [93mCS[0m/[93mCSS[0m. The [93mhighest[0m [93mremoval[0m [93mrates[0m of SO [93m4[0m [93m2[0m- , [93mFe[0m, [93mMn[0m, and [93mZn[0m were [93m92[0m%, [93m99[0m.[93m99[0m%, [93m99[0m.[93m98[0m%, and [93m99[0m.[93m99[0m%, [93mrespectively[0m, for [93mCS[0m/[93m20[0m%[93mCSS[0m. [93mAdditionally[0m, [93mXPS[0m and [93mSEM[0m [93mresults[0m [93mindicated[0m that [93msulfate[0m (SO [93m4[0m [93m2[0m- ) [93mexisted[0m in that [93mgroups[0m [93massociated[0m with [93mCaSO[0m [93m4[0m and [93mFe[0m-[93msulfate[0m [93mcomplexes[0m, while [93mFe[0m, [93mMn[0m, and [93mZn[0m were [93msimultaneously[0m [93mattached[0m to the [93msurface[0m of the [93mmaterials[0m in the [93mform[0m of [93mion[0m [93mexchange[0m, [93mhydroxides[0m, and [93mco[0m-[93mprecipitates[0m.
